'''Guyun Pillars''' are stone pillars of varying quality used to [[Weapon Ascension Materials|ascend]] [[Weapons]].

Originating from [[Guyun Stone Forest]], these pillars are the remnants of the stone spears that [[Morax]] used to defeat his enemies. Over time the defeated gods merged with the pillars, empowering them.<ref name="Guyun Sands">{{Ref/Item|Luminous Sands from Guyun}}</ref>

==Lore==
Guyun Stone Forest is the cemetery of the former gods of [[Liyue]],<ref name="Guyun Stone">{{Ref/Item|Lustrous Stone from Guyun}}</ref> as the stone pillars there are the remains of the stone spears Morax killed them with.<ref name="Guyun Sands"/> Over time the defeated gods merged with the pillars and hatred and curses periodically came from them, but were subdued every time by [[Xiao]].<ref name="Guyun Stone"/> The defeated gods lost their sense of self long ago, and so their hatred is impersonal<ref> {{Ref/Item|Relic from Guyun}}</ref> and simply a result of their unrealized ideals, concepts for a prosperous humanity that were impossible.<ref>{{Ref/Item|Divine Body from Guyun}}</ref>
